main event: On April 22, 1952, a resident of Chicago, Illinois reported seeing a bright light 70,000 feet above the city, moving in a circular course for 5 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at a high altitude of 70,000 feet., The object was observed moving in a circular path., The sighting lasted for a duration of 5 minutes., The source of the report was a civilian., Investigators concluded that it was probably a balloon.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
